title: Flash TV Series Logo Font?
content:
If possible, I would like to know what font this is or other fonts that may come close.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317064848im_/http:/typophile.com/files/the-flash-2014-53786eca2610e_3456.png)

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317064848/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")
author: Warenward

comments.content: Can't state if it's a font or not. The closest I have is [Kostel Infinity Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317064848/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/kostelansky/kostel-infinity-sans). Could be the one or not... More candidates for customization (mainly making /A top larger): [Alien Encounters](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317064848/http:/www.dafont.com/alien-encounters.font) SF, [Elevon](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317064848/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/daltonmaag/elevon) (good one simply closing /A counter)
Thank you very much Ryuk that is perfect! I can do the editing required to bring it more in line with the logo. Thank you again.
